nws.name: Overnight
nws.detailedForecast: A chance of rain and snow showers after 3am. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 32. South wind around 3 mph. Chance of precipitation is 50%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

nws.name: Wednesday
nws.shortForecast: Chance Rain And Snow Showers then Rain And Snow Showers Likely
nws.detailedForecast: A chance of rain and snow showers before 7am, then rain and snow showers likely. Mostly cloudy. High near 43, with temperatures falling to around 41 in the afternoon. South southwest wind 5 to 10 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph. Chance of precipitation is 70%. New rainfall amounts between a quarter and half of an inch possible.

nws.name: Wednesday Night
nws.detailedForecast: Rain showers before 9pm, then rain and snow showers. Cloudy, with a low around 33. Southeast wind 3 to 8 mph. Chance of precipitation is 80%. New rainfall amounts between a quarter and half of an inch possible.

nws.name: Thursday
nws.detailedForecast: A chance of rain and snow showers before 7am, then a chance of rain and snow showers. Partly sunny, with a high near 45. North northeast wind 2 to 6 mph. Chance of precipitation is 40%.

nws.name: Thursday Night
nws.shortForecast: Slight Chance Rain And Snow Showers
nws.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain showers before 10pm, then a slight chance of rain and snow showers. Partly cloudy, with a low around 30. West northwest wind 2 to 6 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

nws.name: Friday
nws.detailedForecast: A slight chance of snow showers before 10am, then a chance of rain and snow showers. Partly sunny, with a high near 45. Chance of precipitation is 40%.

nws.name: Friday Night
nws.shortForecast: Chance Rain Showers then Chance Rain And Snow Showers
nws.detailedForecast: A chance of rain showers before 1am, then a chance of rain and snow showers between 1am and 4am, then a chance of rain and snow. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 34.

nws.name: Saturday

nws.detailedForecast: A chance of rain and snow before 7am, then rain and snow likely. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 49.
